mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yfgp_chatroom ( ease_cr_id, cr_name, cr_desc, cr_owner, max_user, create_time ) VALUES ( #{easeCrId}, #{crName}, #{crDesc}, #{crOwner}, #{maxUser}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT ease_cr_id AS roomId FROM yfgp_chatroom LIMIT #{pageCount},15
SELECT C.ease_cr_id, C.cr_name, C.cr_desc, C.max_user, (SELECT U.user_name FROM yfgp_user U WHERE U.easemob_id = C.cr_owner) cr_owner, C.create_time FROM yfgp_chatroom C LIMIT #{pageCount},15
SELECT * FROM yfgp_chatroom WHERE chatroom_id = ( SELECT cr_id FROM yfgp_sy_chatroom WHERE sequence = #{sequence} ORDER BY add_time DESC LIMIT 1 )
